title: Paul Schweifer
text:
Paul Schweifer (30 March 1914 – 21 November 1941 in <a href="Kursk">Kursk</a>) was an <a href="Austria">Austria</a>n <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a>.
In 1936 he was eliminated in the first round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201936%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20light%20heavyweight">light heavyweight class</a> after losing his fight to <a href="B%C3%B8rge%20Holm">Børge Holm</a>.
